resources.string: The Agent has accepted your request.\nHe will contact you in a short time.\nTo get details about agent.
The Agent has completed his work.\nHe has sent you a request.\nPlease Approve/Decline his work from your approval section
Rowan Sebastian Atkinson CBE is an English actor, comedian and screenwriter
Unable to set profile image. Please try again!
Q1. Why can\'t I sign in?
Q2. Where I can see my Pending Complaints?
Ans- You can see your complaints in the "Pending Complaints" section.
Q3. How can I change setting?
Ans- Click on "Profile" icon in bottom bar and click on setting icon at top right corner.
Q4. How can I update my work ?
Ans- Click on "Pending Complaints" and click on the complaint you want to update and click on "Update".
Q2. How to Generate a QR Code for a new machine?

Ans- Click on "Generate QR" on home screen.Enter all the details related to the machine and click "Generate" button. Now you can see the newly generated QR code and click on "Save" button to save the QR.
Q4. How to Generate a Complaint for a machine?

Ans- Click on "Scan QR" on home screen and Scan the QR.Then you will be redirect to the the "Machine Details" page. To genetare a complaint click on "Genetare Complaint" button and enter the Description for the complaint and click "Confirm" button.
Q5. Where I can see my Complaints?
Ans- You can see your complaints in the "My Complaints" section.Here you can see your "Pending Complaints" and "Complated Complains".
Q6. How can I approve the ServiceMan\'s work?
Ans- Click on "Pending Approval Request" on home screen and click "Accept" or "Decline" accordingly.
This app needs permission to use this feature. You can grant them in app settings.
